articles.author: Michael Voepel, Charlie Creme
articles.title: How Sun shut down Caitlin Clark, Fever to open WNBA playoffs - ESPN
articles.description: Indiana had the best backcourt in the WNBA since play resumed after the Olympics, but the Sun stifled Caitlin Clark and Kelsey Mitchell.
articles.content:
Sep 22, 2024, 07:10 PM ET
The Connecticut Sun looked like the experienced, veteran squad they are, and the Indiana Fever's offense struggled against the team with the top defensive rating in the WNB… [+6913 chars]

articles.author: James Powel
articles.title: Motel 6 owner Blackstone sells chain to Indian hotel startup for $525 million - USA TODAY
articles.description: The budget hotel chain Motel 6 was sold to the Indian hotel start up firm that operates OYO hotels for $525 million in a cash transaction.
articles.content:
An Indian hospitality technology firm is set to buy Motel 6, the motel chain's parent company announced Friday.
In a press release, Blackstone Real Estate said that it came to terms with Oravel Stay… [+1224 chars]
